name: Mad Bread: Fury Roll
description:
(1 player, requires controller)

Winner of the Lightning Jam 2015

Get rye-led up in Mad Bread: Fury Roll, a twin-stick driving survival shooter with a love of all things baked. Out-drive and out-last the other crumby vehicles and collect all the flour to proceed. It's what you're born and bread for. 

A product of a manic 36-hour game jam with the ecclectic theme of “map and bread”,  Mad Bread: Fury Roll was created as a fun, nonsensical homage to a certain film about a roadtrip gone horribly wrong.

Developed by:

Jack Bruxner

Alex Borg

Liam Houston
